description: ZipkinTracingProvider defines the Zipkin tracing provider configuration.

disableSharedSpanContext.description: DisableSharedSpanContext determines whether the default Envoy behaviour of client and server spans sharing the same span context should be disabled.

enable128BitTraceId.description: Enable128BitTraceID determines whether a 128bit trace id will be used when creating a new trace instance. If set to false, a 64bit trace id will be used.
